Class ResourceScatterDiv

java.lang.Object
org.tensorflow.op.RawOp
org.tensorflow.op.core.ResourceScatterDiv
All Implemented Interfaces:
Op
@Operator public final class ResourceScatterDiv extends RawOp
Divides sparse updates into the variable referenced by resource. This operation computes 
# Scalar indices
ref[indices, ...] /= updates[...]

# Vector indices (for each i)
ref[indices[i], ...] /= updates[i, ...]

# High rank indices (for each i, ..., j)
ref[indices[i, ..., j], ...] /= updates[i, ..., j, ...]

Duplicate entries are handled correctly: if multiple indices reference the same location, their contributions multiply.

Requires updates.shape = indices.shape + ref.shape[1:] or updates.shape = [].

  • Method Details

    • create

      @Endpoint(describeByClass=true) public static ResourceScatterDiv create(Scope scope, Operand<? extends TType> resource, Operand<? extends TNumber> indices, Operand<? extends TType> updates)
      Factory method to create a class wrapping a new ResourceScatterDiv operation.
      Parameters:
      scope - current scope
      resource - Should be from a Variable node.
      indices - A tensor of indices into the first dimension of ref.
      updates - A tensor of updated values to add to ref.
      Returns:
      a new instance of ResourceScatterDiv
